TV chef Phil Vickery has broken his silence after he was pictured kissing ex-wife Fern Brittons close pal, insisting that shes just a friend.
The 61-year-old was seen in photos obtained by The Sun s… [+2547 chars]

articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: BTS to go on hiatus and reunite after members perform military service - Polygon
articles.description: BTS members, Jung Kook, Jimin, V, SUGA, Jin, RM, and j-hope, will be taking a temporary hiatus from the group to perform their mandatory service in the South Korean military before reuniting in 2025.
articles.content: One of K-pops most wildly successful and globally recognized groups, BTS, will be taking a short hiatus in the immediate future. The group plan to disband briefly while its members serve their mandat… [+1260 chars]
